document_data.name: Hara-ate
document_data.mainbody: The '''hara-ate''' was a type of [[armor]] used in [[Kara-Tur]].
document_data.Description: The hara-ate was a specialized armor ensemble created to safeguard the front of the wearer's body. It featured a breastplate and thigh protectors constructed with interwoven armor plates. However, the back of the hara-ate remained exposed, leaving it vulnerable to attacks.
